scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Adoration of the Magi. The Virgin Mary, seated and wearing a blue robe and white veil, holds the Christ Child. The Christ Child reaches towards a golden vessel presented by one of the Magi, who is kneeling and dressed in a red and green robe. Another Magus stands behind him, holding a golden crown. In the background, a multi-story building with arched openings and windows is visible, with figures looking out from an upper window. The ground is rendered in gold leaf, suggesting a sacred or divine setting.
